attributes.title: Standard yields
attributes.description:
- Mixing chart yields were compared with SAP yields from 01/01/25 - 31/01/2025. 

Mixing chart yields (400g) - 970,436

SAP yields                    (400g) - 970,431

Variance:                       (400g) - 05loaves.

- It was noted that set BOM yields were realized .
attributes.recommendation:
- Noted adherence to realization of set yields is encouraged in future.

- Realization of set yields ensures that revenue targets are achieved.

value: - We will continue ensure that set yields are achieved.
- We will maintain this trend.

attributes.title: Mixing chart yields recording.
attributes.description: - A spot check on mixing charts on 07.02.25 showed that actual yields were properly recorded on mixing charts and supervisors had verified and counter signed.
attributes.recommendation: - Noted trend of proper mixing charts update is encouraged.

value: - We will ensure mixing charts are timely and accurately recorded.
- We will continue sensitizing dough dividers on the importance of proper mixing chart recording.
Operations/Production Department

attributes.title: Stock count
attributes.description:
- Verification of registers for the period ranging 01/01/25 - 06/02/2025 revealed that they were properly updated and matched SAP system figures.

- Physical stock count of all items on 07/02/2025 and comparison with SAP balances revealed minimal variations.

The table below shows the summary of the stock findings
attributes.recommendation: - The management to ensure that the set stock controls are consistently adhered to avoid stock variances.

value: - More improvement measures will be initiated.
- Control is ok and will maintain the trend
- Minimal item variations were noted. Therefore the company is not exposed to the risk of asset loss.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring strong internal controls are observed,

attributes.title: Stock count
attributes.description:
- Physical stock count on 07/02/2025 showed insignificant variations.

- Stock take registers at the branch showed managers and supervisors stocks were done on daily basis while operations manage did weekly stock count. All findings were properly documented on the registers. 

- Stock take register balances showed minimal variations when compared to SAP balances.
attributes.recommendation: - Noted strong internal controls were commendable and encouraged in future.

value: - We will keep on improving on internal controls.
- Internal controls will continue to be strengthened.
- Strong internal controls noted. Low risk to asset loss.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring strong internal controls.

attributes.title: Raw materials weights.

attributes.recommendation: - Weights of raw materials were in compliant with those set.

value: - Raw material weights were okay.
- We will ensure that sample weights for raw materials are taken upon receipts to ensure compliance.
- Raw materials were randomly weighed and compared with those set by the company.
- Raw materials received at the branch had desired weights.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring  raw material weights complied with those set by the company.

attributes.title: Dough weights
attributes.description: - Dough weights were sampled during first shift on 07.02.2025. Weights fell within the allowed range of dough weight standards.
attributes.recommendation: - adherence to set dough dividing weights is commendable. This should be ensured in future for production of standard weight bread.

value: - We will keep on ensuring compliance to set dough dividing weights standards.
- Adherence to set dough dividing weights will always be our priority.
Sampling of dough weights during production is done to determine compliance.
- Dough weights were within the desired range hence standard bread weight production is assured.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensure compliance to set dough dividing weights.

attributes.title: Packed bread weights
attributes.description:
- Packed bread weights were sampled on 07/02/2025 and weights recorded ana analyzed.

- Overweight bread was noted especially for 600g white bread (CT and barrel).

·         Bread weights were sampled on 07/02/2025 and the following below were the results.
attributes.recommendation:
- Standard set dough dividing weights should be adhered to in order to ensure production of standard weight bread.

- Noted high overweight bread should be addressed.

value:
- Noted overweight bread has been noted during previous weight checks. It was realized that set BOM yields for 600g bread are low and lead to overweight bread production.

We therefore recommend review of yields for 600g barrel white bread.
- Review for 600g barrel white bread is recommended to address noted overweight bread.
- Packed bread weights are taken to ensure compliance with stipulated policies.
- Overweight bread noted means the company lost revenues since desired yields were not realized.
Operations/Production Department
- To ensure packed loaves are of set standard weights.

attributes.title: packed bread weights
attributes.description: - Packed bread weighed on 07/02/25 showed high overweight bread for 600g white bread variety.
attributes.recommendation: - High packed bread overweight rate noted should be addressed.

value: - High overweight bread will be addressed.
- Overweight bread noted will be addressed.
Operations/Production Department
production of overweight bread.

attributes.title: Production damage analysis
attributes.description:
·          The test was conducted to determine the extent of damages produced during production and those replaced as market damages and find out if they were within expected/set limits. High damages suggest bread of inferior quality produced.

·          Both market and production damages were analyzed from 01/01/2025 - 31/01/2025.

PRODUCTION DAMAGE ANALYSIS:

·          Production damage rate is tabulated below.
attributes.recommendation:
·          Proper baking processes will ensure that damages are fully checked.

·          The management should focus on efforts to address high production damages to ensure that the company doesn’t lose revenues.

value: We will put more efforts to address noted high production damages.
Noted high production damages will be addressed.
Operations/Production Department

attributes.title: Mixing chart verification (spot check)
attributes.description: - Mixing charts verified on 07/02/25 at 6.30am showed that records matched actual bread quantity produced

attributes.title: casual staff wage payments.
attributes.description: - Scrutiny of casual payment vouchers and muster roll from 01/02-06/02/25 showed that all casual workers paid on payment vouchers were the same captured on muster roll and biometric system.
attributes.recommendation: - Adherence to set policies on casual hiring and consequent registering them on muster roll and biometric system is encouraged in future.

value: - We always ensure that set duty roosters are adhered to. We have assigned a security guard to ensure only staff on duty clock on the biometric system and we also properly update muster roll.
- We are always strict to ensure casual staff hiring policy is adhered to.
Scrutiny of documents was done to ensure casual staff hiring policy is adhered to.
- The company is not exposed to losing revenue to ghost workers
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring casual staff hiring is as per set policies.

attributes.title: Casual staff payments
attributes.description: - Analysis of casual payment vouchers from 01/02/25 - 06/02/2025 revealed that casual staff wages were as per CBA stipulations.
attributes.recommendation: - Adherence to set CBA rules on casual staff payments is commendable.

value: - We will always align to set policies.
= Set policies on casual payments will be adhered to.
Finance Department
- Ensuring casual staff are paid as per CBA stipulations.

attributes.title: Invoice payments.
attributes.description:
- Analysis of cash flow and debtors analysis from 01/02/25 - 08/02/25 revealed that payments are mainly cash based and only institutions and mini shops (two of them) do cashless payment.

- All invoices at the branch are cleared as per company policies.
attributes.recommendation: - Noted adherence to timely payments is commendable and encouraged.

value: - We always ensure that pending invoices are cleared before supplying bread.
- As per company stipulations we are yet to have cashless system but payments are made in line with company policy.
Scrutiny of cash flow and debtors analysis was done to determine whether company payment policies were adhered to. Analysis was done from 10/02-08/02/25.
- Timely payments suggests that the company is not exposed to bad debts.
Finance Department
- Ensuring that payment policies are complied with.

attributes.title: Cash collection and banking.
attributes.description: - Cash collections and banking analysis was done from 01/02-08/02/25 and showed that all cash collected during the day minus daily expenses was banked the following day.
attributes.recommendation: - Compliance to cash banking policies is commendable.

value: - We will maintain this trend.
- cash flow records are thoroughly scrutinized to ensure all cash collected is banked daily.
Cash flow and SAP system were scrutinized to determine if all cash collected was banked as per company policies.
- Adherence to stipulated policies implies the company is not exposed to cash loss.
Finance Department
- Ensuring all cash collected is banked in line with company policies.

value: - Proper cash control will be maintained.

- Minimal cash variance suggests minimal cash loss risk and effective controls were put in place.
Finance Department
- Ensuring cash control policies are complied with. Ensuring cash at hand matches with balances at the SAP system.

attributes.title: Mini shop spot check
attributes.description:
- Spot check at the mini shop on 07/02/25 showed that all bread transferred at the mini shop was properly accounted for. 

-Bread sales payments were through Mpesa and Mpesa balance tallied that of computed net sales.
attributes.recommendation: - proper controls at the mini shop is commendable and encouraged.

value: - We will keep monitoring mini shop transactions to ensure compliance.
- Random and frequent mini shop spot checks are done to ensure compliance. exceptions noted are always acted upon.
Mini shop spot check was carried out to ensure all bread transferred as per STN is properly accounted for.
- Proper accounting for all bread stock transferred to the mini shop shows the company is not exposed to bread loss.
Sales Department
- Ensuring all bread at the mini shop transferred through STN is properly accounted for.

attributes.title: Mini shop spot check.
attributes.description: - Spot check at the mini shop on 07.02.2025 showed that customers paid for bread upon collection and payments were made through Mpesa.
attributes.recommendation: - Mini shop bread payment policies were adhered to.

value: - We always monitor mini shops to ensure that no credit sales.
- We will maintain this trend.
Spot checks at the mini shop was conducted to check if bread payments were done on cash and ensure that no credit sales.
- Compliant to payment policies ensures that no cash loss and that bread sales are accounted for.
Sales Department
- Ensuring no credit sales at the mini shop.

attributes.title: Debtors analysis
attributes.description:
Debtors analysis was extracted from SAP system as at 07/02/25.

It was noted that many customers had no outstanding balances.

Few exceptions noted were duly explained and reasons were valid (few debts were recoverable)
attributes.recommendation: - Zero outstanding balance for customers is commendable.

value: - We will always ensure that no outstanding balances for customers.

- Debtors analysis is regularly verified to ensure no outstanding debts.

- Incase of outstanding debts, we escalate the same to area sales representatives for follow ups.
Debtors analysis were scrutinized to check incidences of outstanding balances.
- With no outstanding balances implies that the company is not exposed to bad debts.
Finance Department
- Ensuring no customer outstanding balances.

attributes.title: Debtors analysis.
attributes.description: - Daily reporting of outstanding balances was done at the branch according to records verified on 09.02.2025.
attributes.recommendation: - Adherence to set policy on daily reporting is commendable.

value: - We will maintain this trend.
- Daily verification of outstanding customer balance reports is done to ensure that outstanding debts if any are well tracked.
Daily customer balances reports were scrutinized to ensure that records are availed on daily basis.
- Updates of outstanding customer balances ensures that all outstanding debts are promptly addressed.
Finance Department
- To ensure that outstanding customer debts are reported on daily basis.

attributes.title: Debtors analysis
attributes.description:
- debtors analysis for 01.02.25 - 08/02.25 was analyzed to determine if customers with outstanding balances was supplied with bread.

- It was noted that no customer with outstanding balance was supplied with bread.
attributes.recommendation: - Adhering to set customer supply policy is encouraged.

value: - We will maintain the trend.
- This trend will be maintained.

- Adherence to set policies on customer bread supply implies that the company is not exposed to losses through bad debts.

- Ensuring no supplies to customers with outstanding debts.

attributes.title: Production efficiency
attributes.description: ·          Analysis was done from 01/01/2025 - 31/01/2025. Production efficiency is tabulated below;
attributes.recommendation:
·          The branch management should address production inefficiency noted.

·          Branch management should ensure observed proper planning is maintained.

·          Surplus costs incurred from production inefficiency should be surcharged.

value: - We have a problem with unit one production staff of not attaining set targets. We are however taking necessary measures to ensure set targets are realized.
- Production inefficiency noted will be addressed. Measures are being put in place to streamline production staff especially in unit one where inefficiency has been pin pointed.

·          This test was conducted to determine if set production and packing efficiency was adhered to. Low efficiency would indicate increased production costs.

·          Standard production efficiency is 4.5bags/staff.
- Production inefficiency noted increased production costs. In this case production costs were increased by Kshs. 23,905.50.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring adherence to set standard production efficiencies.

attributes.title: Production efficiency analysis
attributes.description:
- Analysis was done from 01.01.25 - 31.01.25 and revealed that set production efficiency of 4.5 was not realized.

- Production efficiency realized was 4.41.
attributes.recommendation:
- Set operational production efficiencies should be adhered to.

- Surplus payments due to production inefficiency should be recovered through surcharge.

value: - We are trying to address production inefficiency especially unit 1 where staff dont realize set targets.
- We are closely monitoring production inefficiency noted in order to put measures to address the same.
Analysis of mixing chart summaries and payment vouchers to determine if set production efficiency was complied with.
- Noted production inefficiency increased production costs.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring set operational efficiencies are rea realized to check production costs.

attributes.title: Production efficiency analysis.

value: - We will put measures to ensure that set production targets are completed within the set time lines.

Records were analyzed to check if set targets were realized.
- Production inefficiency increased production costs.

- Ensuring that set production targets are completed within set timelines.

attributes.title: Motor vehicle fuel consumption.
attributes.description: ·           Analysis for motor vehicle fuel consumption was carried out from 01/01/2025 – 31/01/2025 and results were analyzed on the below table.
attributes.recommendation: - Economical fuel consumption for most sales vans is commendable.

value: - We always fuel vans as per respective set consumption standard.
- We always ensure vehicles are fueled basing on the given consumption standards.

- The exercise was carried out to determine if fuel consumption quantities by sales vans and generators was at par with those provided on the revised permanent file. High fuel consumption would read increased operation costs.

- Ensuring fuel consumed is as per set consumption standards.

attributes.title: Motor vehicle mileage
attributes.description: - Random vehicle odometer spot checks on 07.02.2025 showed that reported distance covered by the vans was accurate.
attributes.recommendation: - Accurate mileage reporting is commendable.

value: - We always maintain accurate and updated information on vans mileage.

attributes.title: Generator fuel consumption.
attributes.description:
·           Generator fuel consumption from 01/01/2025 – 08/02/2025.

·           Below is a tabular illustration of generator consumption.

GENERATOR : (01/01/25 - 08/02/25)

·           Set standard fuel consumption for the generator was not provided.
attributes.recommendation: ·          The branch management should liaise with KAF to have set fuel consumption standard for the generator.

value: - We normally call KAF personnel to get the quantities to purchase for the generator. All fuel is drained and we ensure no fuel balance is left on jerry cans.
·          We will request KAF to have the generator standard fuel consumption determined.

- The exercise was carried out to determine if fuel consumption quantities  generator was at par with those provided on the revised permanent file. High fuel consumption would read increased operation costs.
- Failure to provide set fuel consumption standard for generator implies that its difficult to track whether fuel consumption is economical or not.
Transport/Fleet Department
- Ensuring economical fuel consumption by the generator.

attributes.title: Geerator fuel consumption.
attributes.description:
Analysis of generator fuel consumption from 01.01.25 - 08.02.2025 showed that fueling was done as per telematic readings.

All bought fuel was drained into the genset tank.
attributes.recommendation: - Generator fuel control observed is commendable.

value:
- We always call the person incharge of generators who reads the telematic system and convey on the fuel quantity to be bought.

- All fuel bought is emptied into the generator tank.
- We keep tabs on the fuel bought and fueled on the generator.

The exercise was carried out to determine if fuel consumption quantities by  generators was at par with those provided on the revised permanent file. High fuel consumption would read increased operation costs.
- Noted generator fuel consumption controls checks operation costs.
- ensuring that generator fuel consumption is as per set standards,

attributes.title: Preventive Maintenance schedule
attributes.description:
- A scheduled preventive maintenance (PM) plan was availed by the manager with due dates displayed.

- It was noted that PM is scheduled quarterly, however December was not done due to festivities.
attributes.recommendation: - Timely preventive maintenance of machines and equipment is commendable.

value: - Preventive maintenance is done after every three months.
- Scheduled PM is adhered to.
Inspection was carried out to check whether preventive maintenance was done as per scheduled.
- Regular bakery equipment and machinery maintenance will check maintenance costs and ensure smooth bread making process.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring adherence to  preventive maintenance schedule.

attributes.title: Baking tins condition
attributes.description:
- Inspection of baking tins at the branch showed baking set cycle was in line with production targets.

- Records of baking tins supply show that they were supplied at the branch in the month of March 2024.
attributes.recommendation: - Baking tins and machineries were in good condition and this is commendable.

value: - We always ensure that bakery equipment is in good shape.
- This trend will be maintained.

- Bakery equipment was inspected to check whether they were in right working condition/perfect shape.

- Bakery equipment records were also inspected to check if baking tin cycle time was adhered to.
- Bakery equipment being in perfect shape ensures high quality bread production.
Operations/Production Department
- Ensuring bakery equipment was in sound working condition.
